summary: Environment Mapped Imperial Light Armor for Skyrim. Part of the SkyRealism - Shiny project.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34982-4-1366342851.png[/img]
[center][i]Environment Mapped Imperial Light Armor for Skyrim[/i][/center][center][i][color=black]by MTichenor[/color][/i][/center]
[heading][b]Description[/b][/heading]This is the second texture pack in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33532]SkyRealism - Shiny[/url] armor retexture project.

One thing that annoyed me greatly was hearing the Stormcloaks saying how the Imperial armor looked so shiny, when it wasn't shiny at all. So, I've redone the Imperial Light armor, Penitus Oculatus armor, and General Tullius armor to make it look a bit less worn.

I appreciate comments, especially suggestions about how I can make this look better. I'm new to texturing, and I'm always looking to improve.

Enjoy.
author: MTichenor
